targets.expr: sum by (status) (rate(k6_http_req_failed_sum{group!="::setup", expected_response="false", workflow=~"$workflow"}[1m])) / sum by (status) (rate(k6_http_req_failed_count{group!="::setup", expected_response="false", workflow=~"$workflow"}[1m]))

sum by (status, url) (rate(k6_http_req_duration_sum{group!="::setup", expected_response="true", workflow=~"$workflow"}[1m]))
/
sum by (status, url) (rate(k6_http_req_duration_count{group!="::setup", expected_response="true", workflow=~"$workflow"}[1m]))

sum by (status, url) (rate(k6_http_req_duration_sum{group!="::setup", expected_response="false", workflow=~"$workflow"}[1m]))
/
sum by (status, url) (rate(k6_http_req_duration_count{group!="::setup", expected_response="false", workflow=~"$workflow"}[1m]))

K6 Runner CPU Requests and Limits

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="argo", pod=~"$workflow.*", container="main"}[1m])) by (pod, container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", namespace="argo", pod=~"$workflow.*", container="main"}[1m])) by (pod, container)
